title: Feign Death
content:
the trader will awaken unaware of having been robbed. (May not work in Honor Mode) Crime: If your player is caught in a crime and a guard approaches, quickly casting Feign Death on the culprit will prevent interrogation and the guard will usually lose interest before the spell expires.
